title: 【Student Dormitory】Mandatory Participation in Disaster Prevention Drills for Fall Semester, Academic Year 2024-2025
content:
分類： 活動公告
來源： 學務處 - 鍾佩玲 - free22011@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話03890-6217
對象： 全校學生_大一_大二_大三_大四以上_碩士生_博士生
標題： 【Student Dormitory】Mandatory Participation in Disaster Prevention Drills for Fall Semester, Academic Year 2024-2025
日期： Mon, 16 Sep 2024 11:54:51 +0800

Dear NDHU students,
        To enable students to appropriately cope with emergencies, dormitory disaster prevention drills will be held on the following dates:

Drill I: 2024/10/15 (Tue) 21:00 
Drill II: 2024/10/16 (Wed) 21:00
Note: Each disaster prevention drill begins at 21:00. Please return to your room by 20:40.

        For your own safety, participation is mandatory according to dormitory regulations. Please attend at least one of the drills to avoid penalty of 4 hours of school services. If you have any special reason for absence, please contact Mr. Chung (03)890-6217.

Your safety, OSA’s delight!

Student Living Services Division
Office of Student Affairs
